metadata.title: CVE-2023-5478 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Autofill in Google Chrome prior to118.0.5993.70 allowed a remote attacker to leak cross-origin data via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
